ExploreFact.Text: A tall tower on the surface of the largest planet in the system. The planet's gravity is far too strong to reach the top.
By using another astral body's gravity to help me, I was able to reach the top of the tower.
A cave on the south pole of the largest planet in the system. The cave mouth is filled with ghost matter. A Nomai named Alnus noted that ghost matter can be neutralized with water.
By flooding the planet, I was able to safely enter the cave.
